body.p:
Bryantsville 26th June/61
P Swigert
Frankfort Ky
Dr Sir

When I saw You in Frankfort Monday the 17th You took my address promising to send me such instructions bond sd as would be needed in making up a company of H. G.. You will please forward immediately as a company will be organized on Saturday at this place & we want to be on hand in time for . The county Judge will be on hand to hold the Election &c

6
C. J. Spilman
Home Guards
Garrard
Recd & ans 27" June 1861.
